content: in normal row with turning of the work shape armholes 1 row chain 1 turn slip_stitch in first 6 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 6 st leave this rem 6 st unworked 2 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 3 st leave this rem 3 st unworked 3 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 2 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 2 st leave this rem 2 st unworked 4 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 2 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 2 st leave this rem 2 st unworked 5 row rem 3 double_crochet fasten_off shape neck in the same moment when we begin to shape the armholes we begin also to shape the neck 1 row ds in each st across leave the middle 20 / 36 st unworked 2 row chain 1 turn slip_stitch in first 6 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 6 st leave this rem 6 st unworked 3 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 3 st leave this rem 3 st unworked 4 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 2 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 2 st leave this rem 2 st unworked 5 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 2 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 2 st leave this rem 2 st unworked the second part of the back make in the same way and then make the front in the same way as the straps make 2 x chain 71 and double_crochet in the third chain from the hook *chain 1 skip 1 chain 2 double_crochet in next 2 st * from * till * always repeat and end with chain 1 2 double_crochet fasten_off finishing sew the straps on the front and on the back across the armholes make 1 row single_crochet and 1 row reverse single_crochet across the whole neck and both straps make 1 row single_crochet and 1 row of cluster 1 single_crochet in single_crochet of the previous row skip 2 st 5 double_crochet in the next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet of the previous row repeats across the whole neck and both straps weave in loose ends if you wish you can decorate the front with some crochet flowers ro = chain ks = single_crochet ds = double_crochet rs = back posted double_crochet
